name: Vishal Tatar
desc: We, at Dakshya Nepal, are here to focus on the overall development of a child by implying the necessary means. We will help shape the nation to be recognised globally as the largest digital educator.

name: Abhishek Jha
desc: Education is the foundation and to build that foundation, we will provide the best resources available globally. Dakshya Nepal will be a home name in the coming years in the field of education.
